title: Amanda Holden looks autumnal chic in brown studded skirt and cosy jacket
text:
She has a very early start to her day presenting Heart Radio's Breakfast Show.

But Amanda Holden is always dressed to impress despite her busy schedule, looking chic as she left the London radio studios on Friday.

Amanda, 48, dressed for the chilly temperatures in an autumnal-coloured ensemble.

Stylish exit: Amanda Holden is always dressed to impress despite her busy schedule, looking chic as she left the Heart Radio studios in London on Friday

Amanda showed a hint of leg in a chic brown midi skirt, with studded detail on the pockets and a daring split.

She teamed the statement piece with an elegant white shirt tucked in to emphasise her trim waist.

Over the top, the TV and radio star kept warm in a cosy on-trend shearling jacket in a cream shade.

Looking fab: Amanda, 48, dressed for the chilly temperatures in an autumnal-coloured ensemble, teaming a chic brown skirt with a cosy shearling jacket

The finishing touches were a pair of ankle-strap heels in the same shade as her skirt and a pair of huge shades, adding to the retro '70s vibe.

It's been a busy year for Amanda, who took on the Heart Radio Breakfast Show hosting job alongside Jamie Theakston, following Emma Bunton's departure.

As well as her regular judges slot on Britain's Got Talent, Amanda has also taken on an acting role, as it was announced that she will star as a 'flirty and outrageous' married cougar in ITV comedy Plebs.

In demand: It's been a busy year for Amanda, who as well as taking over the Heart Breakfast Show is also continuing her regular role as a Britain's Got Talent judge alongside Simon Cowell

'I don't know where she gets it from,' the star said in a tongue-in-cheek fashion about her 'flirty and outrageous' married cougar character in the Roman-era comedy.

Her character, Rufina, has eyes for a hunky builder called Jason, something we will see in action when Amanda hits the small screen on October 7th.

'I'm playing Rufina who has a very dry sense of humour, she's flirty and very outrageous.' she said.

'She's definitely on the prowl, but she's not prepared to do anything too naughty because she's married, she just wants a bit of fun.

'She likes to flirt with young, handsome boys! She's a bit of a tease,' the actress added.
description: Amanda, 48, dressed for the chilly temperatures in an autumnal-coloured ensemble.
